home.testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
home.testimonials.1: Dazzling Xchange made my international transfers so easy and fast! Highly recommended.
home.testimonials.2: Excellent customer support and great rates. I use it for all my business payments.
home.testimonials.3: The app is super intuitive and the process is seamless. Love the cashback rewards!
home.testimonials.4: Fast transfers and no hidden fees. My go-to for sending money abroad.
home.testimonials.5: I referred my friends and earned rewards. Great experience overall!
home.tradePayment.copy1: Unleash your global growth. From payments and collections, to tailored risk management and unsecured financing. DAZZLING XCHANGE is your
home.tradePayment.copyStrong: one-stop shop for all your international trade needs.
home.solutions.title: Smart Global Financial Solutions for Modern Businesses
home.solutions.desc: We simplify cross-border commerce by providing intelligent financial solutions that adapt to your business needs. From instant payments to comprehensive risk management, we're your partner in global expansion.

footer.blurb: Dazzling Xchange is a secure, digital remittance platform that makes cross-border transfers simple, fast, and reliable — wherever life takes you.
footer.copyright: 2025 by Dazzling Xchange Pte Ltd | PSO License Number: PS20200465
about.title: Empowering Global Business, Seamlessly
about.subtitle: At Dazzling Xchange, we help businesses break barriers and operate confidently on the global stage. Our platform simplifies cross-border transactions, provides transparent currency exchange solutions, and ensures personalized support every step of the way. Whether you're expanding internationally or managing international operations, we're here to make global business feel local.
about.mission: Our mission is to empower businesses to operate internationally.
about.mission.text: From payments, collections, risk management, financing and more - we help businesses maximize their growth and efficiency while navigating the complexities of international operations.
about.trust.desc: We prioritize security and transparency in every transaction, building lasting trust with our customers.
about.innovation.desc: We continuously evolve our technology to provide faster, more efficient money transfer solutions.
about.accessibility.desc: Financial services should be available to everyone, regardless of location or economic status.
about.impact.desc: We're committed to making a positive impact on communities worldwide through financial inclusion.
about.mission.text2: From payments and collections to risk management and financing – we provide the complete infrastructure for global commerce. Our technology bridges borders, currencies, and regulations to unlock worldwide growth potential.
about.metrics.title: Trusted by Businesses Worldwide
about.metrics.subtitle: Our numbers speak to our commitment to excellence
about.metrics.paymentsProcessed: Payments Processed in the Last 12 Months
services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive financial solutions designed to make your money transfers seamless, secure, and cost-effective.
services.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
services.cta.subtitle: Experience the future of money transfers with our comprehensive suite of services.
services.fast.title: Fast Transfers
services.fast.desc1: Lightning-fast money transfers completed within minutes, not hours or days.
services.fast.desc2: Advanced processing technology ensures your money reaches its destination quickly and securely.
services.lowfees.title: Low Fees
services.lowfees.desc1: Competitive exchange rates and transparent pricing with no hidden fees or surprise charges.
services.lowfees.desc2: Save more on every transfer with our industry-leading low-cost structure and fee transparency.
services.secure.title: Secure Payments
services.secure.desc1: Bank-level security with end-to-end encryption protecting every transaction.
services.secure.desc2: Multi-layer fraud protection and compliance with international security standards.
services.multicurrency.title: Multi-Currency Accounts
services.multicurrency.desc1: One account. Multiple currencies. Hold, convert, and withdraw in major global currencies. Ideal for frequent travelers and global freelancers
modal.sales.title: Open Account
modal.sales.name: Full Name
institutions.title: Global Accounts Solutions
institutions.subtitle: Simplify your international finances with seamless Global Account Solutions designed to support cross-border transactions and multi-currency management
institutions.multicurrency.title: Multi-Currency Accounts
institutions.multicurrency.desc: Hold and manage multiple currencies in one place, with seamless conversions.
institutions.localaccount.title: Local Account Details
institutions.localaccount.desc: Get local bank details in major markets (USD, EUR, GBP, AUD) to receive payments globally like a local.
institutions.payments.title: Streamlined Payments & Real-Time FX
institutions.payments.desc: Send and receive cross-border payments faster and more affordably, with competitive, transparent FX rates.
institutions.integrations.title: Business-Friendly Integrations
institutions.integrations.desc: Easily integrate with your accounting and invoicing tools for smooth operations.
institutions.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
institutions.cta.subtitle: Manage global accounts and currencies with confidence.
corporate.title: Trade Finance
corporate.subtitle: Flexible lending solution. Our lending solution provides you with credit to help finance your international imports.
corporate.secure.title: Secure
corporate.secure.desc: Robust payment infrastructure with strong customer authentication and multiple levels of approval for your payments.
corporate.support.title: Continuous support
corporate.support.desc: Our team is always there to guide you at every stage – choose between live chat support, email or call your relationship manager.
corporate.simple.title: Simple to use
corporate.simple.desc: Our online platform is straightforward to use, which helps you execute your transactions on time and hassle-free.
corporate.reporting.title: Enhanced reporting
corporate.reporting.desc: Generate reports and gather deep insights about your overseas finances to make informed decisions.
corporate.needs.title: Understanding Your Needs
corporate.needs.desc: We listen to your needs and provide the right information to make informed decisions.
corporate.fx.title: Foreign Exchange Risk Management
corporate.fx.desc: Avoid FX risk with our tailored solutions. Get the support you need to protect your business from market fluctuations.
corporate.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
corporate.cta.subtitle: Experience the future of money transfers with our comprehensive suite of services.
services.paymentsCollections.desc: Pay and get paid worldwide with ease, speed and security. Dazzling Xchange offers integrated payment solutions to help you pay, receive and manage your overseas cash flows — all in one place.
services.cards.7: Pay And Receive Effortlessly With Our Integrated Payments Solution
services.cards.8: In The Currencies And Countries Your Clients Want
services.bullets.1: Open local currency accounts without physical presence
services.bullets.4: Use balances to make global payments
services.trade.steps.1: Your supplier sends you an invoice
services.trade.steps.2: You forward the invoice to Dazzling Xchange and we pay your supplier
services.trade.steps.3: You sell your goods or services
services.trade.steps.4: You repay Dazzling Xchange up to 150 days later in your domestic currency
services.trade.example.title: Representative Example
services.fx.cards.1.title: Dedicated Relationship Manager
services.fx.cards.1.desc: Supports and manages your finances with personalized expertise and guidance.
services.fx.cards.2.title: Fixed Forward Contracts
services.fx.cards.2.desc: Lock in a currency rate up to 5 years ahead for complete predictability.
services.fx.cards.3.title: Window Forward Contracts
services.fx.cards.3.desc: Lock a rate and use it during a set period for maximum flexibility.
services.fx.cards.4.title: Non-deliverable Forwards
services.fx.cards.4.desc: Manage exposure in exotic currencies without physical delivery.
services.fx.playbook.title: FX Risk Management Playbook
services.fx.playbook.desc: Our experts' guide to build a robust risk-management framework: identify & avert risk, protect your margins, and budget with confidence.
services.digital.title: Digital Platforms
services.digital.desc: Discover the smart way to access and integrate Dazzling Xchange capabilities with our platform and APIs.
services.digital.featuresTitle: Everything you need in one place
services.approach.pay: Send international payments in 130+ currencies with competitive rates
services.approach.collect: Receive payments from customers worldwide directly into your accounts
services.approach.transact: Execute cross-border transactions with enterprise-grade security
